website_summaries.verdict: A good value for a small safe that can be easily accessed with your fingerprint and is small enough to fit in a closet or cabinet.
pros: Sounds an alarm if left open
Instruction manual included for fingerprint function
Can be bolted to the floor or wall
cons: It can be a little difficult to set up

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I read some bad reviews along with the good ones. Decided to buy and was sctuallt very depressed. Biometric scanners can be tricky. This works great if you follow directions. It stores 32 fingerfrints you scan atkeast 10 of your same finger at different angles, and it will work every time. Love this little safe. If you have lotion on your hands or something you can use your pin. Batteries die, and you have 2 back of keys. Im glad i bought this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect little safe for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little safe for me. It was a little difficult to set up, the technology part, but once I stumbled through the process, it was good to go. It's a great size for the items that I wanted to store. It was easy to mount/secure. I did this myself. I only wish it were fireproof, but I purchased some fireproof bags to go with it. I like this little safe. It has functioned well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd try on two different hand gun safes. This one would accept a pin # readily enough but after a few hrs would make some intermittent beeps and then not accept the combination. If you can't open it it's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Beez on Books

customer_reviews.title: I researched many of these before buying two.  Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these. Gave one to son in law. I'd rather have him owning this for handguns than hearing about a tragedy with my little scamp grandson getting into dads gun case. Easy / quick open when needed with the touch pad. Sturdy construction. I'll be buying more of these for home and RV. Good product Stanley! Well done.
customer_reviews.author: paul Haworth

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This "safe" is a joke. Can be easily opened by removing the Stanley placard. I should have read the reviews before purchase. There is a simple video presentation. I repacked and returned it within fifteen minutes after initial opening. If you purchase this for protection of valuables in time of need, then you are only kidding yourself.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: The batteries that come with the safe are garbage, use good quality alkaline batteries instead
customer_reviews.text: The batteries that come with the safe are garbage, use good quality alkaline batteries instead. Programmed multiple views of my fingers per the instructors, and everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miano

customer_reviews.title: Good safe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty safe. Only thing I don't like is that there is no light to illuminate the buttons at night. They light up when you push them but until you push the first one you are fumbling to find it. Other than that I've had this box for a while now and it has held up very well. Capacity is good and the lock is robust.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Amin

customer_reviews.title: Very capable gun safe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Solidly built, which I would have expected from Stanley. It is large enough to hold all 3 of my pistols, one full-size and 2 conceal-carry. Comes with 2 keys just in case the electronic lock fails for some reason (like maybe the owner not changing the batteries in time).
customer_reviews.author: NavyMom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that biometric is unreliable.  Programmable keypad works well.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is well built, however the biometric finger scanner just doesn't work reliably. Thankfully you can use a programmable multi digit keypad code. And if all else fails there is a security key for unlocking.
customer_reviews.author: satman

customer_reviews.title: Quality safe at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This safe is excellent. It appears to be well built and after reading the instruction manual it was easy to set up both a digital code as well as scanning my fingerprints. It is so quick and easy now to access my truck keys and valuables! This is the best purchase I've made in a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: ak guy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a week now. Pros: Easy to program my finger prints and passcode. About 4-5 secs to unlock using finger reader. Digital display shows remaining battery power. Cons: No keypad backlight. Have to press the # button before using finger reader. Must unscrew name plate to access key hole. Not the best scenario in an emergency if you battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love finger print entry
customer_reviews.text: Solid and fire proof safe that is capable of holding 8 1/2 X 10 paper inside and all of your personal valuables. Love it. The only issue I had with it was that one of the emergency keys did not work. You get 2 keys so it was not a problem. Love it otherwise. Perfect size for my family.
customer_reviews.author: maraki606

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a top opening
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Easy to use, holds two handguns. must locate it where the top can open up, not out sideways. Taking it on trips so can lock up guns while traveling in hotels, etc. Recommending to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lariet442

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe. Much to my surprise, the fingerprint reader works extremely well. Great value. The beeper reminding you to lock it will drive you crazy but it is a good feature to remind you to lock it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer1001

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas so he hasn't gotten it yet. However I was impressed with the size and weight of the product. I think he is really gonna like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cothrum

customer_reviews.title: Geezers Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I am 67 years old and the only finger print it recognizes is my left thumb, which is the one I prefer. I didn't try my toes! I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like someone put the wrong keys with the wrong box
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this one star because the keys didn’t work once I unboxed it. Sounds like someone put the wrong keys with the wrong box. Hopefully the next one will work.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Zinger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, works well , no issues. Fast to get into, lid pops up fast. will hold 1 gun and lots of extra clips and ammo. Or 2 guns a clips. Look like it could hold 3 compact to sub compact guns
customer_reviews.author: amazon prime rocks

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: If you turn it sideways, the bolts unlock. And you can’t mount it to the wall because you have to turn it sideways to open it because the bolts don’t open the whole way. Immediately requested refund
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Geesaman

customer_reviews.title: The concept of this safe is awesome, however this particular one did not work
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this safe is awesome, however this particular one did not work. I spent hours trying to set it up according to the instructions. I finally had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ava M.

customer_reviews.title: Safe is perfect in size
customer_reviews.text: Safe is perfect in size. Love the finger print feature to get in. Dislike the fact that where you but the batteries in seemed cheaply made and broke first day I received it. I ended up having to tape it shut to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Broke into safe no problem at all
customer_reviews.text: Safe was bolted to the floor, someone broke into it so easily. How about making a safe that you can't get into!
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase another just like it if needed
customer_reviews.text: The safe is small but yet big enough for my needs. The combo and finger print to open has been very functional. I would purchase another just like it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The safe came fast, is built very well and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Fingerprint Recognition
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint recognition is very sensitive. I took several prints before trying to open it and it still did not recognize it. It locks itself after several tries, so be careful. I ended using my code instead. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Water/Fire  proof it is not.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed to secure certain important items. Good price doesn't matter it's not water proof or fire proof.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Wasion

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy. Stanley quality
customer_reviews.text: Gifted . brother keeps his gun and valuables in itwith one finger print its open and easily accessible
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Works great and instructions are easy to read. Kinda wish the battery case was more sturdy to prevent it from accident accidentally breaking but other than that I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Arceo

customer_reviews.title: Security factor
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased to store drugs in our facility and we are very satisfied with that security factor now.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the quality of the safe I found it easy to set up with the instructions so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Brehm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t always read finger print
customer_reviews.text: The finger print reader is wishy washy and doesn’t always read correctly. I wouldn’t recommend it if you rely on a quick response to retrieve contents. If not a standard lock and key would suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Tambra Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Great addition and security!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he absolutely loves it - no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to program. Did arrive with the battery compartment latch broken. Tape holds the battery cover closed now, but it should be made a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Cats4Me

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Works great now I have a please to store my valuables. It stores my M&P full size 9 just fine as well. The biometric finger scanner works on point.
customer_reviews.author: jim marquez

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with ordering or delivery and the safe functions exactly as described...I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery but unit did not work properly. Had to send back .
customer_reviews.author: Brian loomis

customer_reviews.title: Biometric combo is hit or miss at best. Works every time with combo though and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Biometric combo is hit or miss at best. Works every time with combo though and is a solid piece when bolted down.
customer_reviews.author: Doogie

customer_reviews.title: This lock box is very nice but unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This lock box is very nice but unfortunately, the feature I bought it for - the fingerprint sensor - doesn't work with my elderly mother's or my disabled brother's fingerprint. We tried several times to get the fingerprint sensor to accept their prints, even clean the screen and had them wash their hands, and tried to no avail. I was able to get it to accept mine however. The other feature I would suggest that they improve on is the lack of lighting of the numeric key pad - its very had to discern without bright lighting. Other than that, it works well and it is serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: K Adams

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again. Great price too
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe. The biometric fingerprint and the keypad option combo is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this product. It is very well made and more sturdier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: daquandre johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The internal dimension do not take into count the safe door width.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Sinher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is a great product at a great price. Easy to set up pin and fingerprints. Opens quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hill

customer_reviews.title: That I can excess it quickly
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup and I can excess it quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with the item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item. Did not work. very disappointed with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A.

customer_reviews.title: Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this safe purchase and will be returning it soon. I actually own the Viking version of this safe:  Even though it looks the same, the quality of the Viking is better. First of all, the Stanley safe was defective, and when I would close the lock, it will close then open again. My viking has a removable shelf, and the carpet lining is higher quality than this. I had purchased the Viking, when it was more expensive than this, but the price has dropped and will be buying that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Johann

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it. It was very easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Primary reason for this purchase was to keep 2 hand guns out of the hands of children in the home. For that purpose, I highly recommend it. It was very easy to set up and program a 4 button code of my choice. I added a motion activated battery operated light, which lights up the contents in my 'dark' closet very nicely every time I open the lid. Holds 2 full size M&P hand guns perfectly. Very nice padded interior.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent gun safe
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent gun safe. The 4 digit formula was a little misleading at first, but once I figured it out, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: TJNikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Safe !
customer_reviews.text: Very secure, easy to use safe. Light and portable, but sturdy with all necessary hardware to make it permanent. Easy to use key pad, easy to program, backed up by hard key access. Room for guns, ammo or other items you wish to keep secure.
customer_reviews.author: rj1118

customer_reviews.title: Great for college
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s graduation so she can keep her jewelry, passport, etc. safe at college. Get this safe for the biometric reader...she loved it. I purchased a magnetic motion light that fit great on the door($10). She loved it. Andy, Raleigh, NC
customer_reviews.author: Andy, Raleigh, NC

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup. The only issue I have is that I had to register my thumb 4 times and occupy 4 entries. It is not as smart as an iphone... Still, worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lu

customer_reviews.title: I'm Glad I Bought It!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the weight of the safe. It would take a sledge hammer to break into this vault. Setting the lock was easy, even for me, and I have a pair of "back-up keys, just in case." I can fit two semi-automatic pistols, with their clips, inside and still have room for extra ammo if I needed it. To summarize my purchase: I'm happy with it, would recommend it to others without reservation, and think it's a good value for what I paid. It's as simple as that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerMike M. from Dallas, PA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to set up and seems to be working. Appears to be a quality safe. Ordering was easy, delivery on time. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: AnneM

customer_reviews.title: Everything about it is solid and it was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made safe. Everything about it is solid and it was easy to set up. All of the fingerprints I set up for entry work just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ElectricMeister

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: The batteries drains every month. This is not helpful if I need to pull out my Glock in an emergency. I am sending this piece of junk back AGAIN. This is the second one I got and it has the same defect. Do they really expect me to remember to change batteries every 2 weeks or pull out a Allen wrench and look for the backup keys while some crazy person is trying to enter my home.
customer_reviews.author: Zhaneta R Mandadzhieva

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to use, solid, and large enough to fit two guns, cash, and jewelry. It slides easily into a drawer. Love the electric key to open quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MPS

customer_reviews.title: Finger print actually works and is very easy to go in and out of
customer_reviews.text: Finger print actually works and is very easy to go in and out of. You can also record more than one persons finger print.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Green

customer_reviews.title: I screwed it down on my closet shelving and it's super easy to access my home defense gun from it ...
customer_reviews.text: This Stanley gun safe is the sweetest little thing for the money. It's a high quality product at a very reasonable price. I screwed it down on my closet shelving and it's super easy to access my home defense gun from it but at the same time, it's also very secure. I would recommend it highly to anyone interested
customer_reviews.author: Ermin Fergerstrom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. Screwed in back and bottom and seem very secure. Easy to program codes and fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Not fire or water safe
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as fire and water safe. While reading the user manual, there's a section dedicated to stating not fire or water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: SP Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!  Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first quick combo safe. Easily fits my 2 handguns and ammo. Padded interior is nice.
customer_reviews.author: KACRX

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon. I absolutely love this safe.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well built safe with plenty of access options. Sturdy steel construction will keep contents safe.
customer_reviews.author: William J Scoville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Plenty of room for two handguns and magazines.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality safe! Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality safe! Easy to program and opens effortlessly. Perfect for my needs! I hope everyone realizes that safes this size aren’t the best deterrent, because of their size alone. It has a lot to do with where and how you anchor them. I believe if someone really wants the contents they will get it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Personal Home Safe Review
customer_reviews.text: This safe is easy to use and was a great price for so much space inside. Very pleased with item and how quickly we received it. Good size for hand guns and other important items.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Hopely Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good product, built soundly.
customer_reviews.text: Thick door and walls. Easy to use and set up. Works great for me
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Family Safe...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Like the biometric lock / keypad combo. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: Very good construction but it was too big for my needs
customer_reviews.author: J. Corral

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. Easy to operate. Fingerprint scanner is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: quick access and easily bolted /secured in drawer or armoire to give good ...
customer_reviews.text: quick access and easily bolted /secured in drawer or armoire to give good level of confidence even with children in home.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Colucci

customer_reviews.title: No because I bought this for my son for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: No because I bought this for my son for Christmas and the key would not open the safe. Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn graybill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has worked perfectly for me. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! Very sturdy, bigger than you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jeffrey woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for my needs; the set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: kelly eberbach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR SO GOOD NO PROBLEMS SETTING FINGER AND PUNCH CODE. WORKING WELL FOR ME SO FAR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Cormier

product_meta.title: Stanley Solid Steel Biometric Personal Home Safe with Fast Access Fingerprint Recognition for Wall, Floor or Closet – Secures Jewelry, Gun, Pistol, Firearms, Money, Valuable, Collectibles & More
feature_bullets: PERSONAL DRAWER SAFE – Heavy, High Quality Safe Securely Protects Home & Office Valuables Including Cash, Guns, Jewelry, Paperwork & Other Small Items
HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION – 5mm Door Features Strong Motorized Deadbolt Locking System; Antirust Body is Seamlessly Welded Out of Cold Rolled Solid Steel
BIOMETRIC INNOVATION – Gain Instant Access With Your Choice of Fingerprint Recognition, LCD Screen w/4-8 Digit Security PIN or Manual Emergency Key Entry
ADVANCED SECURITY – Multiple Forms of Defense Include Warning Beep if Left Open, Up to 32 Fingerprint Memory & Interior Carpeting to Keep Items in Place
CONVENIENT CLOSET SIZE – Compact But Spacious Unit Fits Discreetly Against the Wall or on the Floor; Arrives w/Anchor Bolts & Instructions for Easy Mounting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
